title: Verification process done using different documents without corresponding to user information / User information can be changed after verification

profile.name: EXNESS
profile.about: We provide best trading conditions across multiple markets for clients all over the world.

vulnerability_information:
## Summary:

1. A verified user can change their profile information  (Name, DoB and Address) after identity verification using the API endpoint /kyc_back/api/v2/surveys/personal_info 
2. A  user can verifiy their account with ofical documents that does not correspond to their Name and Address information provided in verification process

*** Note -*** *my.exness.com does not allow to change profile information (Name, DoB, Address) using website or mobile app. The only point where a user can set name, address and dob is when verifying the account but after that, there is no way for the user an option to change such that information in the GUI.*

## Affected enpoints:
  - wbesite and mobile apps

## Steps to Reproduce:

***NOTE -*** The following steps covers the two issues found, changing info after verification and with documents that does not correspond to the user

  1. Open BurpSuite CE, turn off the Proxy feature in order just to log each request made by the browser.
  2. Configure your browser with BurpSuite CE proxy settings
  3. Create an account for a real account (not a demo account), you can use a properly email provider or a dispoable one too
  4. Go to https://my.exness.com/pa/settings/profile
  5. At the top of the window, there is a button that helps to go to the process to verify the account
  6. Verify the current verification step with the code sent to the email used
  7.  Verify the current verification step with the code sent to the phone number used
  7. Add any name, address and dob, click next
  7. Continue with the verification process... 
  8. Select ID card, add your documents (it could be a oficial ID card that does not correspond to you)
  9. You will asked to upload a document to proof your address, add it (you can add an oficial proof of address that is related to the previous document to comply names and address)
  10. Submit your document and wait until they are verified (Do not let the session expires, continue click on the website normally)
  11. Go to BurpSuite CE Proxy > HTTP hisotry tab > searcch for the following request and send it to Repeater: 
```
PATCH /kyc_back/api/v2/surveys/personal_info
Host: my.exness.com
```
  12. Refresh your page after some time, like 15-30 minutes more or less. 
  13. The identity verification was completed
  14. Go to Burp Suite CE Repeater tab, scroll down and change the request body json data to the following:

```
{"first_name":"test-1","last_name":"test-2","test-3":"","dob":"1990-01-01","address":"test-4"}
```

  15. Send the request, you will get a HTTP 200 response with the following body: ***{"status":"OK"}***
  17. The information was changed, you can check it out by browsing https://my.exness.com/pa/settings/profile or https://my.exnesstrade.pro/settings/personalInfo

Information when verification was completed

{F1574748}

Information when verification was completed displayed in my.exness.pro
{F1574749}

Information changed after verification

{F1574752}


Information changed after verification and displayed in my.exness.pro

{F1574751}


## Impact
An attacker can use exness.com platform to start trading under someone's information and verify their account with oficial documents that does not corresponds to them. The business logic flaw in the platform makes it a not good-trusting site for any user being part of the platform or not due to it is possible to use someone's documents.

## Mitigation
Add photo to the profile and then, facial recognition to match the photo on the ID with the person presenting the card
Address recognition to match the address on the proof of address document presented


## Supporting Material/References:
https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/Multifactor_Authentication_Cheat_Sheet.html

## Impact

An attacker can use exness.com platform to start trading under someone's information and verify their account with oficial documents that does not corresponds to them. The business logic flaw in the platform makes it a not good-trusting site for any user being part of the platform or not due to it is possible to use someone's documents.

activities.message:
Hi @mrrvssmx,

Thank you for posting this report.
We are currently investigating the issue and will respond to you as soon as possible.

Hi @mrrvssmx,

We were able to confirm this issue and passed the information to our development team.
We will reach you again when the issue is fixed.

Thank you for making Exness more secure.

Hi, I have one question, why did the severity go to Medium? as mentioned above, Exness was not validating the identity verification after profile information was changed and that makes inconsistency from oficial documents presented. Moreover, identity verification does not match documents to verify the account against the profile information provided when completing the account. 

So, someone's oficial documents can be used by other people making a not trusting-site for trading due to the lack of identity theft, there is a total loss of integrity and confidentiality of someone's documents. Morover, financial activities under someone's identity verification is a high fraud.

Hi @mrrvssmx,

Thank you for your question and thank you for the great report!

Actually, your report was accepted, because you have found a business logic violation, demonstrating the possibility to update personal information unlimited times. However, it is definitely a non-critical severity issue, because of business impact.

> there is a total loss of integrity and confidentiality of someone's documents.

Although we don't use the CVSS score with such cases, I can say that there is no impact on confidentiality here, because it doesn't lead to personal data leaks. Also, there is a Low impact on integrity, because a malicious user can change his/her personal information only.
This case is more about the Business logic violation.

> Moreover, identity verification does not match documents to verify the account against the profile information provided when completing the account.

Regarding this, we know about the problem, and as per our Business analysts, it is acceptable at the moment and will be fixed in the future.

Hi @mickey01x, thanks for the quick response and bounty. 

I'm clear on there is no confidentiality impact but low integrity. However, shouldn't Financial actitvities under other's identity an higher impact to the company as brand damage? Isn't the company and brand itself affected due to there is not match who is using your platform and making/tranfer money under other's identity? Is it low to be able perform those activities? It must comply GDPR and authentication for user information  against documentation provided.

Hi @rrvssmx,

Thank you for the comprehensive information. We appreciate your effort.

> I'm clear on there is no confidentiality impact but low integrity. However, shouldn't Financial actitvities under other's identity an higher impact to the company as brand damage? Isn't the company and brand itself affected due to there is not match who is using your platform and making/tranfer money under other's identity? Is it low to be able perform those activities? It must comply GDPR and authentication for user information against documentation provided.

Actually, this case itself doesn't reduce or increase the ability to conduct financial activities under others' user identity. The registration data and the data in documents are different data and they don't cross each other. This is just a business logic violation.

Regarding `my.exness-trade.pro`, it will be remediated by one the same fix.

Hi @retinamx,

The fix is planned for the next week.
Hope to resolve your report by this time but it depends on our developers.

Hi @retinamx,

Could you please retest the possibility to update personal information?

Thank you.

Hello Exness Security Team,

I’ve joined this report as re-tester.

Credentials used:
sameerphad72@wearehackerone.com


- I went to https://my.exness.com/pa/
- I click on "Become a Real Trader" button
- I verified my mail address and phone number [Burp Suite Proxy was on]
- I verified my personal information and address

{F1939966}

- I clicked on "Complete Verification" button
- I uploaded ID cart as proof and residence proof
- My account verification was done. 

I submitted an PATCH request to `/surveys/personal_info` endpoint captured from burp suite log with new first and last name.  

{F1939972}

- Yep, I was no longer able to update personal details through the request. 

As a result, I was able to confirm the valid fix. 


Regards,
@sameerphad72

Hi @sameerphad72,
Thank you for the retest and sorry for the delay.
